languages.text: Кто-то не только подставил дом Версериан, но также был причастен к нарушениям логистики, организации бунтов и распусканию грязных слухов. Необходимо вычислить того, кому это было на руку.

traits.locale_text: Кто-то не только подставил дом Версериан, но также был причастен к нарушениям логистики, организации бунтов и распусканию грязных слухов. Необходимо вычислить того, кому это было на руку.

languages.text: An unknown party both framed House Werserian for crimes most grave and is culpable for causing supply disruptions, instigating riots, and spreading false rumours. The Rogue Trader must find the one who stands to gain from all this.
languages.original_text: Кто-то не только подставил дом Версериан, но также был причастен к нарушениям логистики, организации бунтов и распусканию грязных слухов. Необходимо вычислить того, кому это было на руку.

traits.locale_text: An unknown party both framed House Werserian for crimes most grave and is culpable for causing supply disruptions, instigating riots, and spreading false rumours. The Rogue Trader must find the one who stands to gain from all this.

An unknown party both framed House Werserian for crimes most grave and is culpable for causing supply disruptions, instigating riots, and spreading false rumours. The Rogue Trader must find the one who stands to gain from all this.

languages.text: Eine unbekannte Partei hat dem Haus Werserian schwerste Verbrechen angehängt und ist schuld an Störungen der Nachschubversorgung, Aufruhr und falschen Gerüchten. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss die Person finden, die von alldem profitiert.
languages.original_text: An unknown party both framed House Werserian for crimes most grave and is culpable for causing supply disruptions, instigating riots, and spreading false rumours. The Rogue Trader must find the one who stands to gain from all this.

traits.locale_text: Eine unbekannte Partei hat dem Haus Werserian schwerste Verbrechen angehängt und ist schuld an Störungen der Nachschubversorgung, Aufruhr und falschen Gerüchten. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss die Person finden, die von alldem profitiert.

languages.text: Quelqu'un a piégé la maison Werserian pour qu'elle soit accusée de terribles crimes et a entraîné l'apparition de perturbations, d'émeutes et de rumeurs fallacieuses. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit trouver qui bénéficie de tout cela.
languages.original_text: An unknown party both framed House Werserian for crimes most grave and is culpable for causing supply disruptions, instigating riots, and spreading false rumours. The Rogue Trader must find the one who stands to gain from all this.

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un a piégé la maison Werserian pour qu'elle soit accusée de terribles crimes et a entraîné l'apparition de perturbations, d'émeutes et de rumeurs fallacieuses. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit trouver qui bénéficie de tout cela.

languages.text: 何者かがウェルザリアン家に何よりも重い罪を着せ、供給途絶を引き起こし、暴動を扇動し、虚偽の噂を広めた。自由開拓者は、これらすべてから利益を得られる人物を見つけなければならない。
languages.original_text: An unknown party both framed House Werserian for crimes most grave and is culpable for causing supply disruptions, instigating riots, and spreading false rumours. The Rogue Trader must find the one who stands to gain from all this.

traits.locale_text: 何者かがウェルザリアン家に何よりも重い罪を着せ、供給途絶を引き起こし、暴動を扇動し、虚偽の噂を広めた。自由開拓者は、これらすべてから利益を得られる人物を見つけなければならない。

languages.text: Alguien desconocido ha culpado a la casa Werserian de sus propios y espantosos crímenes, causando problemas en los suministros, instigando revueltas y propagando rumores falsos. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe descubrir quién está detrás de todo esto.
languages.original_text: An unknown party both framed House Werserian for crimes most grave and is culpable for causing supply disruptions, instigating riots, and spreading false rumours. The Rogue Trader must find the one who stands to gain from all this.

traits.locale_text: Alguien desconocido ha culpado a la casa Werserian de sus propios y espantosos crímenes, causando problemas en los suministros, instigando revueltas y propagando rumores falsos. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe descubrir quién está detrás de todo esto.

languages.text: 某个不知名的政党诬陷韦尔森家族犯下了不可饶恕的罪行，还散布谣言，说韦尔森家族煽动骚乱、散播虚假谣言，导致行星物资供应中断。行商浪人必须找出哪些人可以从这样的污蔑中受益。
languages.original_text: An unknown party both framed House Werserian for crimes most grave and is culpable for causing supply disruptions, instigating riots, and spreading false rumours. The Rogue Trader must find the one who stands to gain from all this.

traits.locale_text: 某个不知名的政党诬陷韦尔森家族犯下了不可饶恕的罪行，还散布谣言，说韦尔森家族煽动骚乱、散播虚假谣言，导致行星物资供应中断。行商浪人必须找出哪些人可以从这样的污蔑中受益。

languages.text: Bilinmeyen kişiler, Werserian Hanesi'ne karşı ağır suçlamalarda bulunup ikmal aksamalarına yol açmak, ayaklanmaları kışkırtmak ve yanlış söylentiler yaymaktan sorumlu olduklarını iddia etti. Hür Tacir, tüm bunlardan fayda sağlayan kişiyi bulmalı.
languages.original_text: An unknown party both framed House Werserian for crimes most grave and is culpable for causing supply disruptions, instigating riots, and spreading false rumours. The Rogue Trader must find the one who stands to gain from all this.
